data.Name: Nerlie Blackburn
data.staff_bio: Nerlie Blackburn works on the JDVRTAC Supplement on Apprenticeships, SGA Qualitative and Langston University RRTC.  Prior to this she worked at the Perkins School for the Blind for 5 years and also has a Culinary Arts Degree. She completed a MPH with a focus in Nutrition program.
data.staff_ed:
B.S., Health Science, University of Massachusetts Boston
MPH, Nutrition, University of Massachusetts Amherst
